info.description: Api to retrieve all transaction details per customer and account/contract, for a specific business date or for the current date
info.title: Account Transaction details

get.summary: Retrieves all transaction details per customer and account/contract, for a specific business date or for the current date

parameters.name: useCurrentDate
parameters.description: Current Date flag for the Business date

parameters.name: businessDate
parameters.description: Business snapshot date of the source data

businessDate.description: Business snapshot date of the source data

debitOrCredit.description: Identifies if the transaction is a Debit or a Credit

foreignExchangeRate.description: The foreign exchange rate for the foreign currency the transaction was completed in if applicable

interestAmount.description: The interest portion of the transaction amount

isCustomerTransaction.description: Yes/No to indicate if the transaction relates to; or is initiated by a customer

principalAmount.description: The principal portion of the transaction amount

traceNumber.description: Transaction trace number; a unique reference number usually used for clearing or ATM/POS transactions

transacationChannel.description: Channel through which the transaction was processed. (ie. ATM; Branch; System)

transacationCurrency.description: The currency  the transaction was completed in

transacationDescription.description: The transaction narrative description (not transaction code)

transacationForeignCurrencyAmount.description: The transaction amount expressed in the foreign currency

transactionCode.description: Transaction code used to post a transaction

transactionNarrative.description: The comment field from the account transaction posting

transactionType.description: Additional classification for Transaction from Insight Master Data

cashFlowType.description: The type of the transaction with respect to the Customer's Cash Flow - Income; Expense or Neutral.

transacationLabel.description: Transaction Label assigned by the Transaction Classification predictive model.

isOutlier.description: Transaction Outlier flag assigned by the Transaction Outlier predictive model.

company.description: The main company associated with the branch when this is a multi-company implementation

transactionBranchName.description: Branch Name where the transaction was posted

transactionBranchNumber.description: Branch Number where the transaction was posted

transacationEmployeeFullName.description: Full employee name associated with the Account Transaction

transactionEmployeeNumber.description: Employee number associated with the Account Transaction

transacationEmployeePosition.description: Position of the employee associated with the Account Transaction

transacationRegion.description: Region of the Branch associated with the Transaction

useCurrentDate.description: Current Date flag for the Business date

accountNumber.description: Account number of specific savings; chequing; term deposit; loan etc.

customerNumber.description: The customer number or customer identification number

contractNumber.description: Contract number of specific savings; chequing; term deposit; loan, letter of credit, etc.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
